Gallery

Quarto can produce a wide variety of output formats. Here are some examples:

  • Articles & Reports
  • Presentations
  • Interactive Documents
  • Websites & Books

Articles and reports with Python and R

Create data-driven presentations

Engage readers with interactivity

Publish collections of articles as a website

Create multi-format books

Articles & Reports

Write a single markdown file and create output in a variety of formats.

HTML for web publishing
PDF for high quality print
MS Word for Office workflows
HTML with advanced layout
PDF with advanced layout

Presentations

Create presentations (slide show) in a variety of formats.

RevealJS HTML presentations
Beamer PDF presentations
PowerPoint presentations

Interactive Documents

Engage readers and deliver more insights with interactive documents.

Observable reactive JavaScript
Shiny web framework for R
Jupyter interactive widgets

Websites & Books

Publish collections of articles as a website or publish a book in multiple formats.

quarto.org documentation
HTML Book with crossrefs
Jupyter notebooks as book
R-Manuals website
Python for Data Analysis, 3E
